inspirational.quotes: The best and most beautiful things in the world cannot be seen or touched- they must be felt with the heart.
inspirational.author: Helen Keller

inspirational.quotes: Keep your face always toward the sunshine- and shadows will fall behind you.
inspirational.author: Walt Whitman

inspirational.quotes: Try to be like the turtle- at ease in your own shell.
inspirational.author: Bill Copeland

inspirational.quotes: Nothing is impossible, the world itself says 'I'm possible'!
inspirational.author: Audrey Hepburn

inspirational.quotes: Don't judge each day by the harvest you reap but by the seeds that you plant.
inspirational.author: Robert Louis Stevenson

inspirational.quotes: Your work is going to fill a large part of your life, and the only wat to be truly satisfied it todo what you believe is great work.
inspirational.author: Steve Jobs

inspirational.quotes: The only way to do great work is to love what you do. If you haven’t found it, keep looking. Don't settle.
inspirational.author: Steve jobs

inspirational.quotes: The best preparation for tomorrow is doing your best today.
inspirational.author: H. Jackson Brown Jr.

inspirational.quotes: I can’t change the direction of the wind, but I can adjust my sails to always reach my destination.
inspirational.author: Jimmy Dean

inspirational.quotes: Perfection is not attainable, but if we chase perfection we can catch excellence.
inspirational.author: Vince Lombardi

inspirational.quotes: Today I choose life. Every morning when I wake up I can choose joy, happiness...
inspirational.author: Kervyn Aucion

inspirational.quotes: No matter what people tell you, words and ideas can change the world.
inspirational.author: Robin Williams

inspirational.quotes: Believe you can and you're halfway there.
inspirational.author: Theodore Roosevelt

inspirational.quotes: Start by doing what's necessary, then do what's possible, and suddenly you are doing the impossible.
inspirational.author: Francis of Assisi

inspirational.quotes: The glow of one warm thought is to me worth more than money.
inspirational.author: Thomas Jefferson

inspirational.quotes: We know what we are, but know not what we may be.
inspirational.author: William Shakespeare

inspirational.quotes: No act of kindness, no matter how small, is ever wasted.
inspirational.author: Aesop

inspirational.quotes: I hated every minute of training, but I said, 'Don't quit. Suffer now and live the rest of your life as a champion.
inspirational.author: Muhammad Ali

inspirational.quotes: To the mind that is still, the whole universe surreders.
inspirational.author: Lao Tzu

inspirational.quotes: Someone is sitting in the shade today because someone planted a tree a long time ago.
inspirational.author: Warren Buffett

inspirational.quotes: If you believe in yourself and have dedication and pride and never quit, you'll be a winner. The price of victory is high but so are the rewards.
inspirational.author: Bear Bryantt

inspirational.quotes: Let us sacrifice our today so that our children can have a better tomorrow.
inspirational.author: A.P.J Abdul Kalam

inspirational.quotes: Put your heart, mind, and soul into even your smallest acts. This is the scret of your success.
inspirational.author: Swami Sivananda

inspirational.quotes: If I have seen further than others, it is by standing upon the shoulders of giants.
inspirational.author: Isaac Newton

inspirational.quotes: Do your little bit of good where you are, it's those little bits of good put together that overwhelm the world.
inspirational.author: Desmond Tutu

inspirational.quotes: We must let go of the life we have planned, so as to accept the one that is waiting for us.
inspirational.author: Joseph Campbell

inspirational.quotes: We can't help everyone, but everyone can help someone.
inspirational.author: Ronald Reagan

inspirational.quotes: Accept the things to which fate binds you, and love the people with whome fate brings you together, but do so with all your heart.
inspirational.author: Marcus Aurelius

inspirational.quotes: It is never too late to be what you might have been.
inspirational.author: George Elliot

inspirational.quotes: There is nothing impossible to him who will try.
inspirational.author: Alexander the Great

inspirational.quotes: Happiness never decreases by being shared.
inspirational.author: Buddha

inspirational.quotes: My mission in life is not merely to survive, but to thrive, and to do so with some passion, some compassion, some humor, and some style.
inspirational.author: Maya Angelou

inspirational.quotes: Be brave enough to live life creatively. The creative place where no one else has ever been.
inspirational.author: Alan Aida

inspirational.quotes: There are no limits. There are only plateaus, and you must not stay there, you must go beyond them.
inspirational.author: Bruce Lee

inspirational.quotes: What lies behind you and what lies in front of you, pales in comparison to what lies inside of you.
inspirational.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

inspirational.quotes: Two roads diverged in a wood and I-took the one less traveled by, and that has made all the difference.
inspirational.author: Robert Frost

inspirational.quotes: Clouds come floating into my life, no longer t ocarry rain or usher storm, but to add color to my sunset sky.
inspirational.author: Rabindranath Tagore

inspirational.quotes: Just don't give up trying to do what you really want to do. Where there is love and inspiration, I don't think you can go wrong.
inspirational.author: Ella Fitzgerald

inspirational.quotes: It is during our darkest moments that we must focus to see the light.
inspirational.author: Aristotle Onassis

inspirational.quotes: If opportunity doesn't knock, build a door.
inspirational.author: Milton Berle

inspirational.quotes: Even if I knew that tomorrow the world would go to pieces, I would still plant my apple tree.
inspirational.author: Martin Luther

inspirational.quotes: Every charitable act is a stepping stone toward heaven.
inspirational.author: Henry Ward Beecher

inspirational.quotes: It is in your moments of decision that your destiny is shaped.
inspirational.author: Tony Robbins

inspirational.quotes: When you have a dream, you've got to grab it and never let go.
inspirational.author: Carol Burnett

inspirational.quotes: As we express our gratitude, we must never forget that the highest appreciation is not to utter words, but to live by them.
inspirational.author: John F. Kennedy

inspirational.quotes: The only journey is the one within.
inspirational.author: Rainer Maria Rike

inspirational.quotes: Let every dawn be to you as the beginning of life, and every setting sun be to you as its close.
inspirational.author: John Ruskin

inspirational.quotes: Every story I create, creates me. I write to create myself.
inspirational.author: Octavia E. Butler

inspirational.quotes: If we did all things we are capable of, we would literally astound ourselves.
inspirational.author: Thomas A. Edison

inspirational.quotes: God always gives His best to those who leave the choice with him.
inspirational.author: Jim Elliot

inspirational.quotes: Change your thoughts and you change your world.
inspirational.author: Norman Vincent Peale

inspirational.quotes: There are two ways of spreading light, to be the candle or the mirror that reflects it.
inspirational.author: Edith Wharton

inspirational.quotes: The only way to discover the limits of the possible is to go beyond them into the impossible.
inspirational.author: Arthur C. Clarke

inspirational.quotes: Happiness is not something you postpone for the future, it is something you design for the present.
inspirational.author: Jim Rohn

inspirational.quotes: The most authentic thing about us is our capacity to create, to overcome,  to endure, to transform, to love and to be greater than our suffering.
inspirational.author: Ben Okri

inspirational.quotes: You must do the things you think you cannot do.
inspirational.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

inspirational.quotes: In a gentle way, you can shake the world.
inspirational.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspirational.quotes: Your present circumstances don't determine where you can go, they merely determine where you start.
inspirational.author: Nido Qubein

inspirational.quotes: Somewhere, something incredible is waiting to be known.
inspirational.author: Sharon Begley
